body:
Hey everyone, I'll like to share with you some of the videos that I made 8 months ago before I took my little break, and anounce that I am making new videos again (the first is ready to be released tomorrow).
My quality is not the best since I don't have a really good computer, and my editing skills are not the best, but I do what I can

I don't want to advertise other servers so I'll just link my avicus' montages (I would love to make some more of this in the near future):
Nexus Montage:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qyt-VQH31SI
Avicus Montage:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DIHZ6Zrhkz4

if you like it you can check some other content that I uploaded on my channel but I'm not adding to this thread

Hope you like it c:

title: Horror's Media Hub!
